bibl.title: Stage Movement and Staging in Menander's Dyskolos. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Argues that major entrances and stage business in Menander's Dyskolos can be staged more easily if Knemon's house is located near the exit of the city (on the audience's right).
